titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَ اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
titles.en: Chapter 37 – The who says, ‘There is no God except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and Allah<sup>azwj</sup> is the Greatest

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَ اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
titles.en: Chapter 37 – The who says, ‘There is no God except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and Allah<sup>azwj</sup> is the Greatest

text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى رَفَعَهُ عَنْ حَرِيزٍ عَنْ يَعْقُوبَ الْقُمِّيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ ثَمَنُ الْجَنَّةِ.
لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَ اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, raising it, from Hareyz, from Yaqoub Al Qummy,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The price of the Paradise is (saying of),
‘There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup> and Allah<sup>azwj</sup> is the Greatest’’.
